column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLMigration in today's interconnected world is at the heart of many key debates: migrants' and asylum seekers' rights; diasporas and transnationalism; citizenship and identity; cosmopolitanism and integration; racism and racialization; equalities and diversity; solidarity and sanctuary; security and borders; international development; and skilled and unskilled labour markets. This interdisciplinary MSc offers the best of migration teaching from across UCL.
column7: Register your interest in graduate study at UCL
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
